scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run package
scripts.dev: npm run all && ( git add . && git status; git commit -m "Dev";git tag -d dev; git push --delete origin dev; git tag -a -m "Dev" dev && git push --follow-tags && npm run issue )
scripts.release: ACTION_VERSION=$npm_package_version && npm run all && ( git add . && git status; git commit -m "Release $ACTION_VERSION";git tag -d v$ACTION_VERSION; git push --delete origin v$ACTION_VERSION; git tag -a -m "Release $ACTION_VERSION" v$ACTION_VERSION && git push --follow-tags )
